A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably my favourite SW movie since A New Hope. And I say that as a long term fan who watched ANH when it was first released. I've been a fan of SW all my 50+ years\, and I liked TFA\, but it felt like a retread of old material. This one really opened the universe out to new stories and to go into unexpected places. The development of the characters made a lot of sense to me and made me like all of the heroes more. I have no idea what's coming next and I love that. I can't wait to find out.
